name: Lost in space - Hunted
description:
Lost in space - Hunted

Made for LMOB beginner game jam 24

You are lost in space and must survive as long as possible whilst being hunted by a hostile ship. You must also make sure you do not run out of fuel. Extra points can be earned by temporarily deactivating the enemy ship or collecting bonus coins. Post your high score in the comments!

Controls -

- Move the mouse to rotate the ship

- WASD to use the ships thrusters (recommended to only use forward thruster at first)

- left click to shoot laser

- right click to shoot more powerful laser (only when square indicator in bottom left is blue)
